videos.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Series – Expert Insights (Part 1)
videos.speaker: SCCF Medical Team
takeaways: Breast cancer is the most common cancer in women
Self-examination is an important first step
questionsToAsk: When should I start getting mammograms?
What are the warning signs to watch for?
Does family history affect my risk?

videos.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Series – Expert Insights (Part 2)
videos.speaker: SCCF Medical Team
takeaways: Screening can detect cancer before symptoms appear
Mammography is the gold standard for screening
questionsToAsk: How often should I be screened?
What happens if something is found?

videos.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Series – Expert Insights (Part 3)
videos.speaker: SCCF Medical Team
takeaways: Some risk factors can be modified
Maintaining healthy weight helps reduce risk
questionsToAsk: Should I consider genetic testing?
What lifestyle changes are most impactful?

videos.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Series – Expert Insights (Part 4)
videos.speaker: SCCF Medical Team
takeaways: Staging determines the extent of cancer
questionsToAsk: What type of breast cancer do I have?
What stage is my cancer?

videos.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Series – Expert Insights (Part 5)
videos.speaker: SCCF Medical Team
takeaways: Surgery is often the first treatment
Lumpectomy vs mastectomy depends on many factors
questionsToAsk: What are my surgical options?
Will I need chemotherapy?

videos.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Series – Expert Insights (Part 6)
videos.speaker: SCCF Medical Team
takeaways: Chemotherapy uses drugs to kill cancer cells
Side effects are manageable for most patients
questionsToAsk: How many cycles will I need?
What side effects should I expect?

videos.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Series – Expert Insights (Part 7)
videos.speaker: SCCF Medical Team
questionsToAsk: What activities can I continue?
How should I adjust my diet?

videos.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Series – Expert Insights (Part 8)
videos.speaker: SCCF Medical Team
questionsToAsk: How can I best support my loved one?
Where can I find caregiver support groups?

videos.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Series – Expert Insights (Part 9)
videos.speaker: SCCF Medical Team
questionsToAsk: How often will I need follow-up visits?
What signs of recurrence should I watch for?

videos.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Series – Expert Insights (Part 10)
videos.speaker: SCCF Medical Team
takeaways: Many breast cancer patients become long-term survivors
Quality of life improves after treatment
questionsToAsk: What does survivorship look like?
How can I connect with other survivors?

videos.title: Onco Talks Episode 1: Oral Cancer
videos.speaker: Dr. Amit Kumar
takeaways: Tobacco use is the primary risk factor for oral cancer
Betel nut chewing significantly increases risk
Early signs include non-healing mouth sores
Regular dental check-ups help with early detection
questionsToAsk: What symptoms should I watch for?
How is oral cancer diagnosed?
What treatment options exist?
How can I quit tobacco?

videos.title: Onco Talks Episode 2: Prostate Cancer
videos.speaker: Guest Oncologist
takeaways: Prostate cancer is common in older men
PSA testing can help with early detection
Treatment options range from surveillance to surgery
Quality of life considerations are important
questionsToAsk: Should I get PSA testing?
What does my PSA level mean?
Is active surveillance right for me?
What are the side effects of treatment?

videos.title: Onco Talks Episode 3: Cancer Surgery
videos.speaker: Guest Oncologist
takeaways: Surgery can be curative for many cancers
Minimally invasive techniques reduce recovery time
questionsToAsk: Is surgery recommended for my cancer?
What type of surgery will be performed?
What is the recovery time?
What are the risks?

videos.title: Onco Talks Episode 4: Ovarian Cancer
videos.speaker: Guest Oncologist
takeaways: Ovarian cancer often has vague early symptoms
Bloating and pelvic pain can be warning signs
Surgery and chemotherapy are main treatments
questionsToAsk: What are the early warning signs?
Should I consider genetic testing?
What is the treatment approach?
What is the prognosis?

videos.title: Onco Talks Episode 5: Childhood Cancer
videos.speaker: Guest Oncologist
takeaways: Childhood cancers differ from adult cancers
Leukemia is the most common childhood cancer
Treatment success rates have improved significantly
Long-term follow-up is important for survivors
questionsToAsk: What type of cancer does my child have?
What is the treatment plan?
How will this affect school?
What support is available for families?

videos.title: Onco Talks Episode 6: Precision Oncology
videos.speaker: Guest Oncologist
takeaways: Precision oncology tailors treatment to tumor genetics
Targeted therapies attack specific cancer features
Not all cancers have targetable mutations
Often fewer side effects than traditional chemotherapy
questionsToAsk: Should my tumor be genetically tested?
Are there targeted therapies for my cancer?
What are the benefits of precision oncology?
Is immunotherapy an option?

videos.title: Onco Talks Episode 7: Bone Marrow & Stem Cell Transplants
videos.speaker: Guest Oncologist
takeaways: Transplants can be curative for blood cancers
questionsToAsk: Am I a candidate for transplant?
What type of transplant is recommended?
What are the risks?
What is the recovery timeline?

videos.title: Onco Talks Episode 8: Lung & Head and Neck Cancers
videos.speaker: Guest Oncologist
takeaways: Smoking is the leading cause of lung cancer
Non-smokers can also develop lung cancer
Head and neck cancers often linked to tobacco and alcohol
questionsToAsk: What stage is my cancer?
What are the treatment options?
How can I quit smoking?
What support is available?

videos.title: Newer Advances in the Management of SCLC
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: Small cell lung cancer treatment is evolving
questionsToAsk: What are the newest treatment options?
Is immunotherapy right for me?
What clinical trials are available?

videos.title: Treatment Dilemma: Monotherapy vs Combination in Advanced EGFR-mutant NSCLC
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: Side effect profiles differ between approaches
questionsToAsk: What is the best approach for my mutation?
What are the side effects of each option?
How do we monitor response?

videos.title: Peri-Operative Immunotherapy in Head & Neck Cancer
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: Immunotherapy is expanding to perioperative setting
Treatment before and after surgery may improve outcomes
questionsToAsk: Am I a candidate for perioperative immunotherapy?
What are the potential benefits?
What are the risks?

videos.title: Importance of TBS in 1L Treatment for RM SCCHN Patients (Part 1)
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: Tumor burden score guides treatment decisions
questionsToAsk: What is my tumor burden score?
How does it affect my treatment?

videos.title: Importance of TBS in 1L Treatment for RM SCCHN Patients (Part 2)
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
questionsToAsk: What factors determine my treatment plan?
What are my options?

videos.title: Redefining NSCLC Management with Atezolizumab
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
questionsToAsk: Is this immunotherapy right for me?
What are the side effects?
How is response monitored?

videos.title: Role of 4-Factor PCC in Uncontrolled Bleeding
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: Managing bleeding is critical in cancer care
questionsToAsk: What are the bleeding risks during treatment?
How are bleeding complications managed?

videos.title: Future of PICC Line Insertion
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
questionsToAsk: Do I need a PICC line?
How do I care for it?
What complications should I watch for?

videos.title: NIAGARA Insights: Perioperative Strategies in Urothelial Carcinoma
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: Perioperative treatment is evolving for bladder cancer
Immunotherapy shows promise in this setting
questionsToAsk: What is the recommended treatment approach?
Am I a candidate for this treatment?

videos.title: Setting a New Course with PADCEV in LA/mUC
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: New targeted therapy for urothelial cancer
questionsToAsk: Is this treatment available for me?
What are the expected outcomes?

videos.title: Darolutamide: Expanding Horizons in Prostate Cancer Management
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: New treatment option for prostate cancer
questionsToAsk: Is this medication right for my situation?
What are the side effects?
How long will I need to take it?

videos.title: Evolving Treatment Paradigm with Immunotherapy in Endometrial Cancer
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: Immunotherapy is changing endometrial cancer treatment
questionsToAsk: Should my tumor be tested for MSI?
Am I a candidate for immunotherapy?

videos.title: Toripalimab in HCC: New-Gen Immunotherapy in Liver Cancer
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: New immunotherapy option for liver cancer
questionsToAsk: What immunotherapy options are available?
How is liver function monitored during treatment?

videos.title: PARPi in Ovarian Cancer: Beyond BRCA and HRD Status
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: PARP inhibitors are effective in ovarian cancer
questionsToAsk: Should I be tested for BRCA mutations?
Am I a candidate for PARP inhibitors?
What is maintenance therapy?

videos.title: Identifying Hidden Threat in EGFR Exon 20 Insertion
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: EGFR exon 20 insertions are unique mutations
questionsToAsk: What type of EGFR mutation do I have?
What treatments target my mutation?

videos.title: Peri-Operative Treatment in Resectable Gastric/GEJ Cancer
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: Treatment before and after surgery improves outcomes
questionsToAsk: What treatment will I receive before surgery?
What is the overall treatment timeline?

videos.title: TDXd in HER2-Low Breast Cancer: A New Frontier in ADC Therapeutics
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: HER2-low is a newly defined category
ADC therapy effective in this group
Testing for HER2-low status is important
questionsToAsk: What is my HER2 status?
Am I eligible for this new therapy?
What are the side effects?

videos.title: HCC Surveillance to Treatment: An Interdisciplinary Dialogue
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
questionsToAsk: Am I at high risk for liver cancer?
What surveillance do I need?
What are my treatment options?

videos.title: Tislelizumab in Esophageal and Gastric Cancer Management
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: New immunotherapy option for GI cancers
Potential in esophageal and gastric cancer
questionsToAsk: Is immunotherapy an option for my cancer?
What combinations are being used?

videos.title: Precision Sequencing in HR-Positive mBC: ADCs, Endocrine Agents, Biomarkers
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
questionsToAsk: What is the best sequence of treatments?
What biomarker testing do I need?

videos.title: Integrating Scalp Cooling into Cancer Care
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: Scalp cooling can prevent hair loss during chemo
Not suitable for all patients or cancers
questionsToAsk: Is scalp cooling available at my center?
Am I a candidate for this?
How effective is it likely to be for me?

videos.title: Transform the Journey for HER2+ Early Breast Cancer Patients
videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: HER2+ breast cancer treatment has transformed
questionsToAsk: What HER2-targeted treatments will I receive?

How long will treatment last?

videos.speaker: Medical Panel
takeaways: CDK4/6 inhibitors are standard of care
